LanguageData.DoubleGraphicLayer_UpdateDesc: Update over layer image (double graphic layer).
LanguageData.DoubleGraphicLayer_ToggleDesc: Toggle over layer image (double graphic layer).
LanguageData.DoubleGraphicLayer_ShowGizmoTip: Display a toggle button if it is possible to switch between second layers. \nTurn it off if you find it annoying. \nEven if disabled, the update button will still be show if needed.(when changing image, etc)
LanguageData.DoubleGraphicLayer_DefaultToggleTip: Whether to turn on the DGL(double graphic layer) when build things.\nEven if off, you can still enable it individually.
